On Friday, April 4, 2003, at 12:28 AM, Bernd wrote:

> question: how is clientObject set to null if client disconnects?

Its not...

> Is this an RMI feature?

therefore no.

For what its worth, here's the test-case I developed my spike against.

public void testMemoryOfDisconnectedClients() throws Exception
{
TestUtils.runGoodClientToCompletion();
TestUtils.runBadClientToCompletion();

// Give Server a couple cycles to cleanup.
Thread.sleep(ServerImpl.SLEEP_TIME * 2);

Server serverUT = getTestServer();

assertEquals(0, serverUT.activeClientList().size());
}


I've attached my spike in case anyone is interested.
